company.name: Northern Core Engineering
company.description: Professional civil and structural design services for commercial, residential, and industrial projects.

hero.title: Building Tomorrow's Infrastructure Today
hero.subtitle: Expert civil and structural engineering solutions for projects of all scales

about.title: About Us
about.content: With over two decades of experience in civil and structural engineering, we provide comprehensive design solutions that combine technical expertise with innovative approaches. Our team of licensed engineers and designers is committed to delivering safe, efficient, and sustainable structures that meet the highest industry standards.

services.title: Subdivisions & Lot Grading
services.description: Comprehensive subdivision planning and lot grading services that ensure proper drainage, functional layouts, and compliance with municipal standards.

services.title: Stormwater Management & Site Services
services.description: Comprehensive design and implementation of stormwater systems and site services, including storm and sanitary sewers, watermains, and utility integration, ensuring proper drainage, functionality, and regulatory compliance.

services.title: Building Permit Drawings & Code Compliance
services.description: Preparation of detailed building permit drawings and design documentation, ensuring full compliance with local building codes, regulations, and approval requirements.

services.title: Project Management & Supervision
services.description: Professional project management and on-site supervision services to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, and meet quality and safety standards.

services.title: Steel Connection Design
services.description: Expert design and review of steel connections, ensuring structural integrity, safety, and compliance with industry standards.

services.title: Structural Design
services.description: Advanced structural analysis and design of steel, wood, and concrete Structures using state-of-the-art modeling and simulation software.

services.title: Renovation & Retrofit
services.description: Design and implementation of building renovations and retrofits to enhance structural performance and functionality.

services.title: Inspections & Reports
services.description: Structural inspections and detailed reporting to assess safety, compliance, and performance of buildings and infrastructure.

services.title: Tender & Contract Documentation
services.description: Preparation of estimate, tender, and contract documents to support competitive bidding, clear scope definition, and smooth project execution.

services.title: MEP Coordination
services.description: Coordination of mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems to ensure seamless integration, functionality, and compliance.

projects.title: Metropolitan Office Complex
projects.description: 15-story mixed-use development with retail and office spaces

projects.title: Riverside Residential Community
projects.description: 250-unit master-planned community with sustainable design features

projects.title: Advanced Manufacturing Facility
projects.description: State-of-the-art production facility with specialized structural requirements

projects.title: Greenfield Subdivision
projects.description: Comprehensive infrastructure planning for 500-lot residential subdivision

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your next project? Get in touch with our expert team.
